overview: Welcome back, Teri! Catch up with the sultry supervixen in a behind the scenes (and between the sheets) look at her brilliant career. She recounts her tumultuous life story in sordid detail -- From hitmen to whores, she's done 'em all. What a cumback! The action is non-stop, featuring some scorching girl/girl scenes and an all star cast featuring Jill Kelly, Brittany Andrews and many, many more!
title: Teri Weigel: Centerfold
